name: Glory Bee Israeli Couscous Recipe
description: Prepare a delicious and simple Israeli couscous dish with this easy-to-follow recipe.

instructions.description: In a large pot, bring 2 cups of water to a boil.
Once the water is boiling, add 1 cup of Israeli couscous.
Stir the couscous gently to prevent it from clumping.
Cover the pot with a lid and reduce the heat to a simmer.
Let the couscous cook for 8-10 minutes, or until it's tender and the liquid has been absorbed.
Turn off the heat and let the couscous rest for a few minutes before serving.

notes: This recipe is adapted from the packaging of Glory Bee Israeli Couscous.
